chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello
Hello! I'm ready to navigate on the map. Could you please describe our starting point?
Starting point is on the map in the top right corner
Thank you for the information. From the top right corner, I can see the whole map spread out in front of me. What should be my next move?
Next travel acroos the stick to the island with the tiger

Got it! I will travel across the stick to the island with the tiger. Moving towards the tiger now. 

I have arrived at the island with the tiger. What should I do next?
Go around the bottom of teh tiger and travel accross to the island with the parrot and elephant

Alright, I will go around the bottom of the tiger and travel across to the island with the parrot and elephant.

I am now on the island with the parrot and elephant. What's my next move?
Go up and over the bird, cross between the elephant and bird and make your way across the rocks to the island with the frog

Understood! I will go up and over the bird, cross between the elephant and bird, and make my way across the rocks to the island with the frog.

I have reached the island with the frog. What's the next step?
Travel under the frog to the middle of the island.  After loop back across the the allligator back to the island of with the parrot and elephant

Got it. I will travel under the frog to the middle of the island, and then loop back across the alligator to reach the island with the parrot and elephant.

I have reached the island with the parrot and elephant again. What's the next direction?
Cross the rocks to the island with the giraffe

Understood. I will cross the rocks to the island with the giraffe.

I have arrived at the island with the giraffe. What should I do next?
Go under the giraffe and cros the stick to the island with the snake and treasure.  make sure you cross over the snack to get to the treasure.

Alright, I will go under the giraffe and cross the stick to the island with the snake and treasure. I will make sure to cross over the snake to reach the treasure.

I have successfully crossed over the snake and reached the island with the treasure. 

*finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello
Hello! Welcome to the map navigation game. Are you ready to begin?
Lets go!

Great! You are starting at the top-right corner of the map, next to a white dog. 

Step 1: Take a few steps to the left (west), passing below a wooden bench, and cross a trail. Then make a u-turn to the left, cross the trail again, and head back toward the white dog. Describe what you see along the way.
I have crossed the wooden bench and made a uturn back towards the dog

Good job! Now, just near the white dog, you'll see a wooden branch crossing a river. Step 2: Cross over the branch to the south and continue heading southwards. Can you describe what you see as you move along?
I am across the branch and there is a dog and a picnic ahead
Fantastic! Step 3: Walk over the picnic mat, touching a bowl of berries, and continue westward. What do you notice as you move in this direction?
I have touched the berries.  The dog is near and another branch to cross
Great progress! Step 4: Cross over the second wooden branch, this time going north. Take your time and describe your surroundings as you make your way across the branch.
There is a bridge with a couple on a tandem bike

Wonderful! Step 5: Once you've crossed the river, instead of touching the green bush, circle around it from the right side until you reach the florist stand. Take your time and describe what you see near the stand.
I am at the stand next to the bridge

Perfect! Step 6: Turn to the left (west) and walk below the florist stand. After passing the stand, you'll come across a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Can you tell me what you see on and around the bridge?
Should I cross the bridge
Not yet. Step 7: Just past the bridge, there are two elderly people sitting on a bench reading newspapers. Describe what you see near the bench and the bridge.
There is another stand and an older couple on a bench

Great observation! Step 8: Move south a few steps, between the old people and another wooden branch. Then, you'll reach a green bush next to the end of the wooden branch. What do you notice as you navigate this part of the map?
There is a deer on the ground
Almost there! Step 9: Move east, between the branch and the bush. Take your time and describe your surroundings as you reach the final objective.
Should I make my way to the deer?
Yes, you're so close! Step 10: Move a few steps to the east and you will reach the brown young deer. Congratulations, you have successfully reached the final objective! Well done!

chat.msg: Welcome!
We are going to start at the tent at the top of the map
Alright, I'm at the tent at the top of the map. What should I do next?
You are going to travel down to the right of the dog
Got it. I'm heading down to the right of the dog. I see a fire to my right. What's the next step?
I am sorry to the left of the dog
No problem, I will head to the left of the dog. Now I see the fire to my left. What's next?
Head down the path towards the fire
Understood. I am heading down the path towards the fire. I see a red mushroom to my right and a blue car further south. What's the next step?
Take a path over the fire off of the path and get back on the path in front of the mushrooms
Alright, I will veer off the path, careful to step over the fire, and get back on the path in front of the mushrooms. I am now back on the path. What's next?
Head towards the car then loop back and follow the path down untill you reach the telescope
Okay, I am heading towards the car. Now, I will loop back and follow the path down until I reach the telescope. I have arrived at the blue telescope. What now?
Travel off the path in between the telescope and the bush until you come again to the path
Got it. I will travel off the path in between the telescope and the bush until I come across the path again. I have reached the path. What do I do next?
There should be a cabin up ahead of the trail.  Travel there

Great, I will continue along the path and head towards the cabin. 

I have arrived at the wooden house. *Finished!* Is there anything else you'd like me to do on the map?

chat.msg: Welcome!
I am ready
Great! Let's start. Look for a group of three palm trees near you. Can you see them?
Got em
Fantastic! Now, stand under the first tree, facing south-west. Let me know when you're there.
I am there
Perfect! From where you are, turn right and continue walking. Let me know when you reach the second palm tree.
Ok
Great! Now, imagine you're standing just before the third palm tree. Take a sharp left turn and start moving south. Let me know when you're on your way.
Ok I am ready to head south
Fantastic! As you continue south, you'll come across a brown puppy. Keep to the left of it and continue moving. Let me know when you've passed the puppy.
Passed the dog

Well done! Now, as you continue southward, you'll approach a big rock on your left and a small rock on your right. Navigate between them and keep moving towards the south. Let me know when you're between the rocks.
Ok
Great job! Now that you're between the rocks, keep going straight ahead until you reach the water. Let me know when you've reached the water.
I am at the water
Fantastic! Now, step into the water and face a large red crab. Once you're facing the crab, turn right (west) and start walking. Let me know when you're on your way.
Ok

Great! As you continue westward in the water, you'll come across a third medium-sized rock. Once you reach it, keep your eyes peeled because there might be something in the water ahead. Let me know when you've reached the third rock.
Reached the rock
Excellent! Now, pay attention to your surroundings. In the water ahead, you'll spot a shark. Be cautious, and make a sharp right turn to avoid it. Let me know when you've made the turn.
Avoided the big shark

Phew! Well done on navigating past the shark! Now, it's time to return to land. Head back to the land and look for a blue-yellow-white ball. Once you find it, make sure to go between the ball and the medium-sized rock. Keep moving north and let me know when you're between the ball and the rock.
done

Great job! Now, veer slightly to your left and start heading towards the northwest. As you continue, you'll come across a red tent on your left and a larger speaker on your right. Keep going between them. Let me know when you've passed them.
Passed

Awesome! Now, here comes a bit of a twist. Instead of continuing straight, I want you to circle around the red tent in an arc. Once you've completed the arc, continue south towards the sea. Let me know when you're at the shore.
At the shoreline
Fantastic! Now, as you stand at the shoreline, turn right (west) and walk along the shore, just below a red kayak. Keep going in that direction and let me know when you're below the kayak.
Done

Excellent! Now, it's time for the final stretch. Turn 90 degrees to your right (north) and start moving along the side of the red kayak. Keep going until you reach a small green bush. That's your final objective! Let me know when you get to the green bush.
Left or right side of the kayak?
Apologies for the confusion. Walk along the left side of the red kayak. Keep going in that direction, and you'll reach the small green bush. Let me know when you're there!

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I do not have a problem with others switching languages
general_survey.question: What do you think when others mix languages in conversation? Please explain:

general_survey.answer: I enjoy speaking and trying to learn different languages.
